titleStmt.title: Catalogue of Tamil and Telugu Manuscripts (BnF) by Vinson, Feer et al.

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A cumulative (printed and handwritten) catalogue of the Tamil and Telugu manuscripts in the now BnF by Julien Vinson, Léon Feer et al.

The codex contains:
Catalogue (printed) by Julien Vinson for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark) = BnF Indien 1-204 (new shelfmark) (U1). Second proof-readings of December 24, 1867 and January 6th, 1868 for Tamil 1-111, then first proof-readings of December 27, 1867 and January 8th, 1868 for Tamil 112-204; corrected in black ink by Vinson (?) or by Feer (?).
Catalogue (handwritten) by Julien Vinson for Tamoul 205-496 (old shelfmark) = BnF Indien 205-496 (new shelfmark) (U2).
Catalogue (handwritten) by Léon Feer Vinson for Tamoul 497-574 (old shelfmark) = BnF Indien 497-574 (new shelfmark) (U3).
Catalogue (handwritten) by Julien Vinson for manuscrits télingas, canaras, malayalas 1-60 (old shelfmark) (U4). Only Telugu manuscripts are in fact described.
Letter by Vinson to Guérin, dated February 3rd, 1868 (U5).
Catalogue (handwritten) by Léon Feer for manuscrits télingas, canaras, malayalas 61-65 (old shelfmark) (U6). Only Telugu manuscripts are in fact described.
Composite manuscript described as a multi-text manuscript for the sake of convenience.
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

collation.desc: 8 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation.
49 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (printed proofreadings) for Tamoul 1-204 = BnF Indien 1-204. Pagination 1-49. Arabic library foliation 1-49. Versos blank.
64 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for Tamoul 205-496 = BnF Indien 205-496. Arabic library foliation 50-113.
20 folios = Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for Tamoul 497-574 = BnF Indien 497-574. Arabic library foliation 114-125, 125A-125H.
11 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for télingas, canaras, malayalas 1-60. Arabic library foliation 126-136.
1 folio = Letter by Vinson to Guérin, February 3rd, 1868. Arabic library foliation 137.
2 folios = Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for télingas, canaras, malayalas 61-65. Arabic library foliation 138-139. f139v blank.
4 folios = back guard leaves. Arabic library foliation 140-142, 143.

handNote.desc: Hand #2 (Feer). The descriptions of no. 572-573 (apparently by the hand of Rodet) are papers pasted on the page (f125Dr). The description of no. 574 might not be by Feer (f125Dr).

origin.origDate: The descriptions by Vinson were started in 1866 (see u1 f[3]r). Feer died in 1902.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
